title: Metalocalypse/Dethklok credits/titles font?
content:
Any Metalocalypse fans out there?

I'm trying to figure out what font they use... its unbelievably metal. Found a couple that are close but not quite, House's Blaktur and P22's Canterbury among them... both are also pretty metal.

An example can be found here:  
 [http://www.axelmusic.com/resources/covers/back/053939797725.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623020935/http:/www.axelmusic.com/resources/covers/back/053939797725.jpg "http://www.axelmusic.com/resources/covers/back/053939797725.jpg")

Thanks rockers  
Go Font and Die.
author: nonplussed
